overview: (C)ANSWERS explores the biological and social cancers that plague American society. Breht Gardner takes you inside one man's emotional cancer battle and discovers that cannabis prohibition is where race, politics, and the business of medicine powerfully intersect. (C)ANSWERS follows cancer patient Ray Odom through traditional oncology and medical cannabis treatments and displays the anxiety of diagnosis, the joy of success and the desperation of last-chance natural medicines. The film offers a philosophical examination of how cancers change lives.
title: (C)ANSWERS: The Answers to Cancer
